replies.msg:
自己睇維基百科。當時立例倉猝，條文含糊，有違美國憲法第五修定 (Fifth Amendment)，基本上失效。未被推翻嘅原因係未有人用，所以冇人challenge。一有人用呢條法律告就會自動打甩兼作廢。

The Yale Law Journal lauded the Act as the “most direct statutory attack on internal communism yet undertaken [by 1955] by Congress,”[5] but stressed the “haste and confusion of the Act’s passage” which led to many “vague and ambiguous provisions.”[5] The incongruity of its provisions, a grave constitutional defect, was in part attributed to obscure language. For example, the nature of the “rights, privileges, and immunities” to be terminated by the Act was never explicitly stated as relating to state or federal jurisdiction.
